title: The Sixth Borough
description: After a series of traumatic events, Sander discovers he can access supernatural abilities, but magic in this world is like a shotgun, violent and almost impossible to control. Haunted by tragedy, he is drawn into a secret world hidden behind the fa√ßade of New York City, a world of occult power and conspiracy where a vicious struggle for power will determine the fate of the city.
author: Alan    Bradley
